org.xcsp.common

Class Size.Size2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xcsp.common.Size
      • org.xcsp.common.Size.Size2D
  • Enclosing class:
    Size

    public static class Size.Size2D
extends Size
    A class for representing the size (i.e., length of each dimension) a 2-dimensional array. This is mainly used as syntactic sugar.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.xcsp.common.Size

        Size.Size1D, Size.Size2D, Size.Size3D, Size.Size4D, Size.Size5D

      static Size.Size2D build(int length0, int length1)
      Builds an object that represents the size (i.e., length of each dimension) of a 2-dimensional array.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public static Size.Size2D build(int length0,
                                int length1)
        Builds an object that represents the size (i.e., length of each dimension) of a 2-dimensional array.
        Parameters:
        length0 - the size (length) of the first dimension of a 2-dimensional array
        length1 - the size (length) of the second dimension of a 2-dimensional array
        Returns:
        an object that represents the size (i.e., length of each dimension) of a 2-dimensional array
